title: Strengthening Instructional Design Competencies in Practice: Medical Assessment Item Development Through Collaborative Problem-Creation Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge and experience with assessment tools
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Design core elements of multiple-choice questions (MCQs) - stems, correct distractors, and incorrect distractors - based on integrated medical knowledge
Improve the validity and discrimination of items by utilizing peer feedback during collaborative question-creation processes
Develop differentiated content reflecting clinical errors that may occur in diagnostic situations when creating incorrect distractors
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
